rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:news:newsdata&rev=1423041333&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-02-04T10:15:33+01:00</dc:date>         <dc:creator>vturpin</dc:creator>         <title>public:news:newsdata - New event</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:news:newsdata&rev=1423041333&do=diff</link>         <description>*  head: New International Polar Challenge Launched - Under the Sea-Ice  *  start: 2015-02-04  *  stop: 2015-04-30  *  text:   The World Climate Research Program (WCRP) is launching a Polar Challenge to reward the first team able to send an Autonomous Underwater vehicle (AUV) for a 2000km mission under the sea-ice in the Arctic or Antarctic.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:events:events:conference:2015:06:18:mts_ieee-oceans-2015&rev=1416479372&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-11-20T11:29:32+01:00</dc:date>         <dc:creator>mortier</dc:creator>         <title>public:events:events:conference:2015:06:18:mts_ieee-oceans-2015 - created</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:events:events:conference:2015:06:18:mts_ieee-oceans-2015&rev=1416479372&do=diff</link>         <description>Jointly sponsored by the Marine Technology Society (MTS) and IEEE Oceanic Engineering Society (OES), the Oceans'15 Conference and Exhibit is the major international forum gathering scientists, engineers, responsible ocean users and decision makers to present their cutting-edge research results, ideas, and applications in Oceanic Engineering and Marine Technology. The exchange of knowledge and the opportunities offered to new fruitful collaborations are crucial to the development of innovative te\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:events:events:meeting:2014:09:25:esfri-update-2016&rev=1410949359&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-09-17T12:22:39+01:00</dc:date>         <dc:creator>vturpin</dc:creator>         <title>public:events:events:meeting:2014:09:25:esfri-update-2016</title>         <link>http://www.groom-fp7.eu/doku.php?id=public:events:events:meeting:2014:09:25:esfri-update-2016&rev=1410949359&do=diff</link>         <description>Will be launched at a workshop on 25th September, in Trieste  On 25th September 2014 ESFRI will launch the third Roadmap update at a workshop in Trieste, Italy. The objective of the Roadmap launch workshop is to raise awareness of the scientific community about the next roadmap update in 2015-2016, and the associated landscape analysis of research infrastructures within their specific scientific fields. The workshop is organised by CoPoRI in close cooperation with ESFRI and the European Commissi\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item> </rdf:RDF>
